comments:
When out application reaches a breakpoint it appears to hang. I can suspend the 
app but when attempting to resume I get a dialog stating that :-

Resume failed.
Reason:
 Exceptions occurred attempting to resume

com.sun.jdi.ObjectCollectedException occurred resuming VM.


The first time I debug the app everything is OK  the problems occurs on 
subsequent executions of the application.  The log entry follows :-

What VM version are you using to run/debug your program?
Paul, which JVM are you using?

I've looked over the code in the stack trace and I don't believe this is an 
issue anymore in the 3.0 development stream. If an ObjectCollectedException 
occurs, we will catch it and throw a DebugException this debug exception is 
caught in LaunchViewContentProvider#hasChildren(), which logs the exception 
quietly and returns false.
I am using the Sun 1.4.2 JVM
